GameEngine

Class ColliderPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEngine.ColliderPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollider

    public class ColliderPolygon
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICollider
    Class that represents a collider for a polygon object. Provides the logic to check for collisions with other colliders and centers the figure according to the transform.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ColliderPolygon(Polygon p, ITransform t)
